title: sara guna paalimpa
sahitya:
saraguna pAlimpa samayamurA nIku sari evarunnArurA sarasija nEtrA

anupallavi

 varaguNa shESAdri varada venkatEshvara vanaja sambhavanuta varamulosagi nannu

caraNam

 shatadhruti pUjita gajarAjuni moraliDagA anughrahinca lEdA 
ati vedajendina parama bhaktuDagu prahlAduni munu nI brOvalEdA
manmata janaka maharSamunaku nIkEttana mahanIya shrInivAsa ninnu
satkathalanuvini ninu vEDitini manasu karagi nIvu nAdu sankaTamula dIrcci
